markdownRemark.html:
The new #data Tag

There’s a new ‘#data’ tag here on my blog, since I’ve realized a lot of my projects labeled with the ‘#dev’ tag are more specifically data crunching problems, namely the the Monopoly probabilities post and the Invaders generation post.

Anyway, this is just a simple housekeeping post - look for more #data tagged posts to come!

Cheers! 🍺

Chris
